definition: to put down the pen/to stop writing
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: I will end here and hope to hear from you very soon.
sentences.chinese: 我要就此擱筆了，盼望早日收到你的來信。

sentences.english: Mother wants me to help her in the kitchen. I'll say goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽要我下廚房幫忙，就此擱筆。

sentences.english: I want this to catch the morning mail, so I must shut up now.
sentences.chinese: 我要這信趕上早晨的郵班，所以只得擱筆了。

sentences.english: I have to stop here, since it is my working time, talk to you next time.
sentences.chinese: 由於正在工作中，就此擱筆，下次聊。

sentences.english: That's all for today, I'll talk to you more next time. Bye!
sentences.chinese: 今日就此擱筆，下次再跟大家閒聊，拜拜。

sentences.english: And by the time I got up, four hours had passed.
sentences.chinese: 當我擱筆時，已經過去了4個小時。
